info.name: BankingSystemAPI
info.description: This collection provides a comprehensive set of requests to test the BankingSystemAPI. It covers all major functionalities including authentication, user management, account operations, transactions, and administrative tasks. Each request includes detailed documentation on its purpose, required parameters, and expected responses.

item.name: Auth

header.value: refreshToken=p-kc-QLbYKi_GhYOgeMyOLqKG8mzrRHOBwxNP0VI280; expires=Fri, 03 Oct 2025 19:17:14 GMT; path=/; secure; samesite=strict; httponly
refreshToken=fQgYlGzT7wEeQMkTVlcrqxMkRzTyD51a0e7B0UgvDfE; expires=Fri, 03 Oct 2025 20:58:50 GMT; path=/; secure; samesite=strict; httponly

response.name: Revoke Token

item.description:
### Authentication Controller

The Authentication controller provides endpoints for managing user authentication sessions. This includes logging in with credentials to obtain JWT access and refresh tokens, using a refresh token (sent via a secure HttpOnly cookie) to get a new access token, logging out to securely invalidate a session, and revoking tokens for a specific user as an administrative action.

item.description:
### Users Controller

Endpoints for managing user accounts. This includes creating, reading, updating, and deleting users, as well as managing their passwords and active status.

item.name: Accounts

response.name: Delete Account

item.description:
### Accounts Controller

Provides endpoints for general account management. These actions are not for creating accounts but for retrieving and deleting them. Account creation is handled by specific account-type controllers (e.g., CheckingAccounts, SavingsAccounts).

item.name: AccountTransactions
item.description:
### Account Transactions Controller

Handles all core financial operations for accounts, including depositing, withdrawing, and transferring funds, as well as checking account balances. These endpoints are rate-limited to prevent abuse.

``` json
  { "id": 1, "name": "National Bank of Egypt" },
  { "id": 2, "name": "Banque Misr" },

  { "id": 4, "name": "AlexBank" }
]

 ```

EndFragment

response.name: Delete Bank

item.description:
### Banks Controller

Endpoints for managing bank entities. This includes creating, reading, updating, and deleting banks, as well as managing their active status. Access is restricted to authorized administrative users.

item.description:
### Checking Accounts Controller

Endpoints specifically for managing Checking Accounts. This includes creating, reading, and updating accounts that have an overdraft limit.

### Currencies

| ID | Code |
|----|------|
| 1  | USD  |
| 2  | EUR  |
| 3  | GBP  |
| 4  | EGP  |
| 5  | SAR  |

item.name: Currency

response.name: Get All Currencies

item.description:
### Currency Controller

Endpoints for managing currencies and their exchange rates. These operations are typically restricted to administrative users.

item.name: RoleClaims
item.description:
### Role Claims Controller

Endpoints for managing the permissions (claims) associated with roles. This allows for fine-grained control over what actions users in a particular role can perform.

item.name: Roles

response.name: Delete Role

item.description:
### Roles Controller

Endpoints for creating, reading, and deleting roles. Managing the permissions for these roles is handled by the RoleClaims controller.

response.name: Get Interest Logs By Account Id

item.description:
### Savings Accounts Controller

Endpoints specifically for managing Savings Accounts. This includes creating, reading, and updating accounts that accrue interest. Also provides endpoints to view interest payment history.

### Currencies

| ID | Code |
|----|------|
| 1  | USD  |
| 2  | EUR  |
| 3  | GBP  |
| 4  | EGP  |
| 5  | SAR  |

### Interest Types

| Value | Name      | Description                     |
|-------|-----------|---------------------------------|
| 1     | Monthly   | Interest calculated monthly     |
| 2     | Quarterly | Interest calculated quarterly   |
| 3     | Annually  | Interest calculated annually    |

item.name: Transactions
item.description:
### Transactions Controller

Provides endpoints for reading transaction history. Financial operations like deposit or transfer are handled by the `AccountTransactions` controller.

item.name: UserRoles
item.description:
### User Roles Controller

Endpoints for managing the assignment of roles to users.
